timeline.bodyText: This change makes the preceding comment much more difficult to understand.
timeline.author: daniel-beck

replies.bodyText: Hi, I suggest you can use (Ctrl+I). This shortcut evaluates any code statement. We must care about code readability.
replies.author: oguzhancevik

replies.bodyText: This statement says if existingAuth object is derived AnonymousAuthenticationToken return true, else return false. I removed only if statement.
replies.author: oguzhancevik

replies.bodyText:
I know what you did. I'm confused by your comment

Hi, I suggest you can use (Ctrl+I). This shortcut evaluates any code statement. We must care about code readability.

in response to me pointing out that the preceding source code comment makes no sense after this change.
replies.author: daniel-beck

timeline.author: daniel-beck
